Proficiency with Heavy Armour. All Classes at Level 4

Heavy Armour Master Tips & Notes

It provides you armor proficiency with light armor and increase your Strength and Dexterity by one. If you're like a spellcaster who wants light armor, you can pick that up easily from a race, and you don't really need Strength and Dexterity as a spellcaster all that much.
